General.Name: Intech Biopharm Ltd
General.Description: Intech Biopharm Corporation focuses on developing and manufacturing generic drugs to treat respiratory diseases. It owns iLEF (inhaled low ethanol formulation), a metered dose inhaler platform for treating asthma and chronic pulmonary obstructive disease; and dry powder inhaler, a product comprises of blisters and capsules. The company offers its products under the SYN006, SYN010, SYN007, Synflutide, Duasma, Synvent, and SYN011 names. Intech Biopharm Corporation was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
